Articles.Content:
So Firstly thanks to all the Modders out there for continuing to supply the community with there time to make these mods .

 When 2001 came out to general release I got to see it , after that I was pretty much hooked on Science fiction and have been for over 50 years .

So here it is my take on it in Kerbal way . Yer I know the ship in the movie goes into the centre of the Station , still not worked out how to make a decent enough craft to do that , that the Krakken won't go  " Oh look another victim "

Oh yeah special occasional guest appearance by the Mouse Cursor

...........................................................

.........................................................................

Mods Used
Aviation Lights
B9 Areospace , B9 HX , B9 Legacy , B9 Animation Modules , B9 PartSwitch
CameraTools
DistantObject
DockRotate
E.V.E
KS3p
KSPRC
LBSI
MagicSmokeIndustries
Opt ,Opt Legacy , Opt Reconfig
Planetshine
RealPlume
Scatterer
SoundtrackEditor
StationalCunstructs
StationPartsExpnasion
TURD
Tweakscale
UmbraspaceIndustries
WildBlueIndustries
................................................
Edited in Vegas Pro 15 & Video Converter Ultimate .
Music Royalty Free from various sources .

Edited March 12, 2019 by Puggonaut
Spelling as usual

Brilliant stuff, man. Nice craft and nice video too. The vertical take-off ssto is quite something! Nice!

Mind telling what EVE and scatterer configs you did use??

cheers, and keep up the good work

1 hour ago, Dafni said:

Brilliant stuff, man. Nice craft and nice video too. The vertical take-off ssto is quite something! Nice!

Mind telling what EVE and scatterer configs you did use??

cheers, and keep up the good work

there all stock configs , thanks for the compliement .
For some reason, the words 'Multipurpose' and 'Emergency' don't go together for me.
